creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: drawstring pouch with twisted red, green and blue drawstring; strings of beads terminating in green, red or blue thin pompons and clusters of beads at edges; brown fabric body with multicolored checkerboard and bar embroidery at edges on each side; central panel on each side stitched in predominately red with zigzag patterns
dimension: 5 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. (13.34 x 10.8 cm) (pouch only, without beads or drawstring)
title: Pouch
